description: Leading the development of internal enterprise platforms. Spearheaded the migration of legacy systems to modern React-based architectures, resulting in a 40% improvement in load times.
Collaborated with design teams to implement pixel-perfect user interfaces for various client projects. Assisted in backend API integration and database management.
Helped internal team for collecting data and maintaining university applications. Improved data processing workflows.
Developed Android applications and web solutions for various clients in the digital marketing sector.
